Description.Text:
Property Location
Palais Hansen Kempinski Vienna is in the heart of Vienna, walking distance from St. Mary on the Strand and Sigmund Freud Museum. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Holocaust Memorial and Judenplatz.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 152 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring iPads and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an indoor pool, a sauna, and a steam room. Additional amenities at this Art Deco hotel include concierge services, babysitting/childcare, and shopping on site.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Palais Hansen Kempinski Vienna is in the heart of Vienna, walking distance from St. Mary on the Strand and Sigmund Freud Museum. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Holocaust Memorial and Judenplatz.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

St. Mary on the Strand - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Sigmund Freud Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Holocaust Memorial - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Judenplatz - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Schottenkirche - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
St. Ruprecht's Church - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Karmeliter Market - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Jewish Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Votive Church - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
University of Vienna - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Schwedenplatz - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
St. Peter's Church - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Rotenturm Street - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Kohlmarkt Street - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Minorite Church - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Palais Hansen Kempinski Vienna is Vienna (VIE-Vienna Intl.) - 16.7 km / 10.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
